Class BloggerController

  • java.lang.Object
    • play.mvc.Results
      • play.mvc.Controller
        • controllers.BloggerController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    play.mvc.Http.HeaderNames, play.mvc.Http.Status

    public class BloggerController
extends play.mvc.Controller
    BloggerController class; Contains our methods through which we control all action concerning the Bitpik blog;

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static play.mvc.Result addBlog()
      Method addBlog() adds a blog to our list of all blogs and saves to database through the method createBlog() located here in the BlgggerController;
      static play.mvc.Result bloggerPicture(int id) 
      static play.mvc.Result createBlog()
      Method createBlog() takes the entered values from the form that the blogger has entered and creates (instanciates) the Blogger object, thus making one Blog and saving it to the database;
      static play.mvc.Result deleteBlog(int id)
      Method deleteBlog(int id) receives the parameter int id, which is the id of the blog that the blogger User has choosen to delete;
      static void deletePicture(int id)
      This method is called when the blogger User has decided to delete the picture of a certain blog, The method receives the id of the blog that the blogger wants to delete and deletes the picture;
      static play.mvc.Result editBlog(int id)
      Method editBlog() is called when the blogger has choosen to edit a blog; The clicked Bloged id is sent to this method; and the editBlog page will be shown to the blogger.
      static play.mvc.Result saveEditedBlog(int id)
      The method saveEditedBlog(int id) is called upon saving the edited blog, after that the blogger has edited a certain blog of his choice; This method receives the id of the blog that is being edited;
      static play.mvc.Result saveFile(int id)
      Method saveFile() i called if the blogger has choosen to upload a picture to the blog he has just added through the method addBlog() & createBlog(); And in the case if the blogger has choosen to skip this adding the picture our saveFile() method sets the picture of the just added blog to the default picture This method receives the id of the just created Blog;
      static play.mvc.Result searchBlog(java.lang.String q)
      Method searchBlog(String q) receives a String as a parameter and searches the list of all the blogs by that name and sends the list found to the blog.html page
      static play.mvc.Result searchTag(java.lang.String q) 
      static play.mvc.Result showBlog()
      Method showBlog() renders the blog.html page with the following parameters, correct - The list of all te blogs from our database; listing in the order from the newly added to the old ones;
      static play.mvc.Result showOneBlog(int id)
      Method showOneBlog(int id) receives the parameters integer id, finds the choosen blog to view by the id and renders the page oneBlog.html Rendering the page with the parameters > the list of all the blogs, current user and the choosen blog to view;

    • Method Detail

      • showBlog

        public static play.mvc.Result showBlog()
        Method showBlog() renders the blog.html page with the following parameters, correct - The list of all te blogs from our database; listing in the order from the newly added to the old ones;
        Returns:
        Result rendering the blog.html

      • showOneBlog

        public static play.mvc.Result showOneBlog(int id)
        Method showOneBlog(int id) receives the parameters integer id, finds the choosen blog to view by the id and renders the page oneBlog.html Rendering the page with the parameters > the list of all the blogs, current user and the choosen blog to view;
        Parameters:
        id -
        Returns:
        Result rendering the oneBlog.html

      • addBlog

        public static play.mvc.Result addBlog()
        Method addBlog() adds a blog to our list of all blogs and saves to database through the method createBlog() located here in the BlgggerController;
        Returns:
        Result rendering the createBlog page

      • createBlog

        public static play.mvc.Result createBlog()
        Method createBlog() takes the entered values from the form that the blogger has entered and creates (instanciates) the Blogger object, thus making one Blog and saving it to the database;
        Returns:
        Result redirecting to the next page where the blogger has a choice to add a picture to the blog he has just added;

      • saveFile

        public static play.mvc.Result saveFile(int id)
        Method saveFile() i called if the blogger has choosen to upload a picture to the blog he has just added through the method addBlog() & createBlog(); And in the case if the blogger has choosen to skip this adding the picture our saveFile() method sets the picture of the just added blog to the default picture This method receives the id of the just created Blog;
        Parameters:
        id -
        Returns:
        Result rendering the showBlog.html

      • bloggerPicture

        public static play.mvc.Result bloggerPicture(int id)

      • editBlog

        public static play.mvc.Result editBlog(int id)
        Method editBlog() is called when the blogger has choosen to edit a blog; The clicked Bloged id is sent to this method; and the editBlog page will be shown to the blogger. The page editBlog is full of the forms needed in order that the blogger edits the name, description and the long description of the blog choosen;
        Parameters:
        id -
        Returns:
        Result rendering the editBlog.html

      • saveEditedBlog

        public static play.mvc.Result saveEditedBlog(int id)
        The method saveEditedBlog(int id) is called upon saving the edited blog, after that the blogger has edited a certain blog of his choice; This method receives the id of the blog that is being edited;
        Parameters:
        id -
        Returns:
        Result rendering the addBlogPicture.html

      • deleteBlog

        public static play.mvc.Result deleteBlog(int id)
        Method deleteBlog(int id) receives the parameter int id, which is the id of the blog that the blogger User has choosen to delete;
        Parameters:
        id -
        Returns:
        Result redirecting to the showBlog() page;
